meanings.definition: Willfully tell an untruth when giving evidence to a court; commit perjury.
meanings.sent1: He decided to perjure himself in court by lying about his whereabouts.
meanings.sent2: The witness was caught trying to perjure during the trial.
meanings.sent3: It would be foolish to perjure in front of the judge and risk getting caught.
meanings.sent4: Her attempt to perjure was like trying to hide a bright light in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of perjuring can be severe, so it's best to always tell the truth.
